### Learning Objectives

* Working with multiple dataframes, Joins and Keys
* Relational Database basics: design and tradeoffs
* Working with R and SQL
* Basic database normalization



### Readings

* __RDS__ (R for Data Science): [Chapters 18-21](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/whole-game)

* [SQL for Data Scientists](https://sqlfordatascientists.com/). Renee Teate. Wiley.
